<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104525</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104525</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202611</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">You Ate What??</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie Aßen, Was??</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous Avez mangé Ce qui ? ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você Comeu Que??</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Avete mangiato Che cosa??</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάγατε ποιο ??</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted Comió Lo que??</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">After reading the novel "All Quiet on the Western Front" by Erich Maria Remarque, students will use primary sources to relate Paul's experience to the life of a North Carolina soldier. Students will create their own primary source journal entry.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nach den Roman ganz auf stille Art lesen "auf der 
westlichen Frontseite" durch Erich Maria Remarque, verwenden 
Kursteilnehmer Primärquellen, um Erfahrung Pauls auf dem Leben eines 
Nord-Carolina Soldaten in Verbindung zu stehen. Kursteilnehmer 
erstellen ihren eigenen Primärquelljournaleintrag.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Après lecture du roman "toute la Tranquillité sur l'avant 
occidental" par Erich Maria Remarque, des étudiants emploiera des 
sources primaires pour associer l'expérience de Paul à la vie d'un 
soldat du nord de la Caroline. Les étudiants créeront leur 
propre écriture comptable primaire de source.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Após ter lido a novela "toda quiet na parte dianteira 
ocidental" por Erich Maria Remarque, os estudantes usarão fontes 
preliminares relacionar a experiência de Paul à vida de um soldado 
de North.carolina. Os estudantes criarão sua própria entrada 
de jornal preliminar da fonte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dopo la lettura del romanzo "tutto il quiet sulla parte 
anteriore occidentale" da Erich Maria Remarque, gli allievi useranno 
le sorgenti primarie per riferire l'esperienza del Paul alla vita di 
un soldato del North.carolina. Gli allievi creeranno la loro 
propria entrata di giornale primaria di sorgente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετά από να διαβάσουν το νέο "όλοι ήρεμοι στο 
δυτικό μέτωπο" από τον Erich Maria Remarque, σπουδαστές 
θα χρησιμοποιήσουν τις αρχικές πηγές για να αφορούν την εμπειρία 
Paul τη ζωή ενός στρατιώτη της βόρειας Καρολίνας. Οι 
σπουδαστές θα δημιουργήσουν την αρχική είσοδο περιοδικών πηγής 
τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Después de leer la novela "todo silenciosamente en el 
frente occidental" por Erich Maria Remarque, los estudiantes 
utilizarán fuentes primarias para relacionar la experiencia de Paul 
con la vida de un soldado de Carolina del Norte. Los estudiantes
crearán su propia entrada de diario primaria de la fuente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

    </metadata>
  </description>
